name: Senior Engineer, SoC Simulation Platform
description:
Yadro Microprocessors (YMP) is building a team of professionals to move Functional Platform Simulation capabilities to the next level of maturity.

What will you do:

Functional Simulation is essential part of modern SoC design which helps to validate architecture and design at early stages. However, YMP team is willing to evolve this capability to various other important areas including but not limited to:

  • Verification acceleration (co-simulation with VCS)
  • FPGA Prototyping speed-up and design size mitigation (partial prototyping)
  • HW tests/Firmware/OS development early enabling
  • Application specific and system SW stack early development and adoption
  • SoC level design alternatives modeling and hypothesis validation

What do we expect from a future team member:

  • Interested in working on big problems in functional simulation area
  • Already familiar or willing to learn HW uArch and still remain SW developers
  • Want to work on open source and cutting-edge simulation frameworks and tools
  • Be valuable partner of HW design team which is building RISC-V based SoC

We will be glad to offer you:

  • Nice salary + juicy incentive bonuses
  • Health care insurance for you and supported VMI for your family members; sports events, employee support program: psychological, legal and healthy lifestyle consultations with external specialists.
  • Office in Minsk, hybrid or remote work on the territory of Republic of Belarus
  • Employee training and development programs;
  • Internal Innovation Support Program;
  • Award system for scientific achievements, publication of articles and registration of patents;
  • "Lecture hall", where invited experts and our specialists share their professional experience from various fields of science.

About us

YADRO Microprocessors is an emerging vendor designing RISC-V based System-on-Chip for datacenter and consumer market. The company was set up within the YADRO group of companies based on a technological partnership between the leader of the domestic enterprise infrastructure market – YADRO, and one of the global semiconductor IP market leaders and co-founder of RISC-V consortium – Syntacore.
